content: As a result of these major acquisitions and partnerships, Universal Music Group has been able to expand its reach and diversify its offerings. By acquiring EMI Music and DreamWorks Animation, Universal Music Group now has access to an extensive library of music and animated content, respectively, giving the company greater control over content distribution and licensing. Additionally, the acquisition of FameHouse and minority stake in Activision Blizzard's King Digital Entertainment has allowed Universal Music Group to expand its services and offerings in the digital marketing and gaming sectors. Finally, the acquisition of Ingrooves Music Group has allowed Universal Music Group to expand its services to independent labels and artists, solidifying its position as a global leader in the music industry. All of these factors have contributed to Universal Music Group's success in recent years, allowing the company to continue to grow and thrive in an ever-changing industry.
